security: Extreme care should be exercised in connection with any use of the attached material. Public disclosure of some of this material could result in physical jeopardy to present and former FBI sources utilized in these programs.
summary: This teletype outlines the FBI's response to the Senate Select Committee's (SSC) request for information on former employees and Cointelpro activities, including contacting former employees and providing summaries of Cointelpro actions against various groups.
summary_one_paragraph: This teletype from the FBI Director to various field offices details the Bureau's response to the Senate Select Committee's (SSC) inquiries, specifically regarding former FBI employees who might be interviewed by the SSC and information related to Counterintelligence Programs (Cointelpro). The teletype instructs field offices to contact listed former employees, inform them of potential SSC interviews, offer legal counsel assistance, and furnish results to the Bureau; it also provides summaries of Cointelpro actions against groups like the Communist Party USA, Socialist Workers Party, White Hate Groups, New Left, and Black Extremists, emphasizing that no actions resulted in physical injury or used electronic techniques, surreptitious entries, or mail openings.
title: SENSTUDY 75
recipient: SAC (Special Agent in Charge), Various Field Offices
